title: LiveEdutvICO
author: LiveEdutvICO
content: Staking AnnouncementDon't miss out on this opportunity to earn  #PassiveIncome in the Market.Earn up to 3% APY when you stake your $LEDU on #EducationEcosystem. #Staking goes live from October 20th. Stake Period: 3 monthsStake Site: https://staking.educationecosystem.com/https://educationecosystem.com/blog/ledu-3-staking-campaign-october-to-january-2023/
